text.section:
A vendor shall keep:
complete and accurate records of:
all retail sales and sales for use; and
the sales and use tax collected; and
other records in the form that the Comptroller requires by regulation, including bills of lading and invoices.
A vendor shall make the records under subsection (a) of this section available for inspection and examination by the Comptroller at any time during business hours.

A vendor shall keep the records required under subsection (a) of this section for 4 years, unless the Comptroller:
consents in writing to an earlier destruction of the records; or
requires in writing that the records be kept longer.
